sentences.en: Some families go without medical treatment because of their inability to pay.
sentences.cn: 有些家庭因无力支付医疗费用而得不到医治。

sentences.en: Wall Street analysts have been highly critical of the company's seeming inability to control costs.
sentences.cn: 华尔街的分析家们对该公司似乎无力控制成本一事一直批评甚多。

sentences.en: Her inability to concentrate could cause an accident.
sentences.cn: 她无法集中注意力可能会导致意外。
